TBarCode 11: Barcode Generator Quick Start

Many thanks for installing TBarCode!

TBarCode11 is an advanced barcode generator software component supporting more than 100 different barcode symbologies. TBarCode can be used by software developers as well as by users. It contains the following modules:

  • Barcode DLL (Dynamic Link Library)
  • Barcode ActiveX Component
  • Barcode .NET Component

Please note: TBarCode is a software component. It can't be executed by itself.

If you are looking for stand-alone barcode software or specific add-ins please check out the following products:

  • Barcode Add-In optimized for Word/Excel 2007/2010/2013/2016: Download TBarCode Office or watch the YouTube videos.
  • Barcode Maker, Barcode Creator: Download Barcode Studio or watch the YouTube videos.
  • Label Printing and Report Generator Software: Download TFORMer Designer or watch the YouTube videos.
  • Barcode Printing Solutions for SAP ERP systems: Overview.
  • System-Level Barcode Extension for Linux, Mac OS X and UNIX: Overview.

Quick-Start

This document provides an overview regarding the use of TBarCode. For more detailed information please check out the user and developer manuals. You may also be interested in the video tutorials hosted on YouTube. In case of questions please contact us via email (support@tec-it.com) or phone: [++43] (0)7252 72720.

Microsoft Office - First Steps | Developers: Example Applications | Installed Files | Documentation | YouTube Videos

Microsoft Office - First Steps

This chapter focuses on the use of TBarCode11 with Microsoft® Office products.

Word 2016 |Word 2013 | Word 2010 | Word 2007 | Word 2003
Excel 2016 |Excel 2013 | Excel 2010 | Excel 2007 | Excel 2003
Access 2016 |Access 2013 | Access 2010 | Access 2007 | Access 2003


Microsoft® Office Word 2016

  1. Open Word.
  2. Please check whether the DEVELOPER tool bar is visible in the ribbon.
    If it is visible, please continue with f).
  3. Click the File menu and select Options from menu on the left side.
  4. Select the Customize Ribbon entry from the menu on the left side.
  5. Check the check box Developer in the Main Tabs list and click Ok to apply the change. Now the DEVELOPER tool bar is visible.
  6. In the Ribbon shift to the DEVELOPER tool bar.
  7. Select the Legacy Tools item from the Controls chunk. (1)
  8. Select More Controls from the menu and choose TBarCode11 from the list to insert a barcode object. (2)
  9. Right click the barcode object and select TBarCode11 Object/Properties... from the pop-up menu. (3)
  10. Adjust the properties in the property dialog and click Ok to apply the changes.

New Product Available!

TEC-IT offers TBarCode Office, a very easy-to-use barcode add-in for Microsoft Office 2007 and later. This add-in integrates seamlessly into Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel. All bar codes are pre-configured according to industry standards; thus this barcode add-in is best suited for non-experts.

Download TBarCode Office from http://www.tec-it.com and check out the YouTube videos!
Click to enlarge

Microsoft® Office Word 2010

  1. Open Word.
  2. Please check whether the Developer tool bar is visible in the ribbon.
    If it is visible, please continue with f).
  3. Click the File menu and select Options from menu on the left side.
  4. Select the Customize Ribbon entry from the menu on the left side.
  5. Check the check box Developer in the Main Tabs list and click Ok to apply the change. Now the Developer tool bar is visible.
  6. In the Ribbon shift to the Developer tool bar.
  7. Select the Legacy Tools item from the Controls chunk. (1)
  8. Select More Controls from the menu and choose TBarCode11 from the list to insert a barcode object. (2)
  9. Right click the barcode object and select TBarCode11 Object/Properties... from the pop-up menu. (3)
  10. Adjust the properties in the property dialog and click Ok to apply the changes.

Microsoft® Office Word 2007

  1. Open Word.
  2. Please check whether the Developer tool bar is visible in the ribbon.
    If it is visible, please continue with f).
  3. Click the Office button in the upper left corner and select Word Options from the menu.
  4. Select the Popular entry (=first entry) from the menu on the left side.
  5. Check the check box Show Developer tab in Ribbon and click Ok to apply the change. Now the Developer tool bar is visible.
  6. In the Ribbon shift to the Developer tool bar.
  7. Select the Legacy Tools item from the Tools chunk. (1)
  8. Select More Controls from the menu and choose TBarCode11 from the list to insert a barcode object. (2)
  9. Right click the barcode object and select TBarCode11 Object/Properties... from the pop-up menu. (3)
  10. Adjust the properties in the property dialog and click Ok to apply the changes.

New Product Available!

TEC-IT offers TBarCode Office, a very easy-to-use barcode add-in for Microsoft Office 2007 and later. This add-in integrates seamlessly into Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel. All bar codes are pre-configured according to industry standards; thus this barcode add-in is best suited for non-experts.

Download TBarCode Office from http://www.tec-it.com and check out the YouTube videos!
Click to enlarge

Microsoft® Office Word 2003

  1. Open Word.
  2. Select item Object... of the Insert menu. (1)
  3. Choose TBarCode11 from the list box to insert a barcode object into the document. (2)
  4. Right click the barcode object and select TBarCode11 Object/Properties... from the pop-up menu. (3)
  5. Adjust the properties in the property dialog and click Ok to apply the changes.

Click to enlarge

Microsoft® Office Excel® 2016

  1. Open Excel.
  2. Please ensure that the DEVELOPER tool bar is visible in the Ribbon.
    If it is visible, please continue with f).
  3. Click the File menu and select Options from menu on the left side.
  4. Select the Customize Ribbon entry from the menu on the left side.
  5. Check the check box Developer in the Main Tabs list and click Ok to apply the change. Now the DEVELOPER tool bar is visible.
  6. In the Ribbon shift to the DEVELOPER tool bar.
  7. Select the Insert item from the Controls chunk. (1)
  8. Select More Controls from the menu and choose TBarCode11 from the list, and insert a barcode object by drawing a rectangle on the surface. (2)
  9. Right click the barcode object and select TBarCode11 Object/Properties... from the pop-up menu. (3)
  10. Adjust the properties in the property dialog and click Ok to apply the changes.

New Product Available!

TEC-IT offers TBarCode Office, a very easy-to-use barcode add-in for Microsoft Office 2007 and later. This add-in integrates seamlessly into Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel. All bar codes are pre-configured according to industry standards; thus this barcode add-in is best suited for non-experts.

Download TBarCode Office from http://www.tec-it.com and check out the YouTube videos!

Microsoft® Office Excel® 2003

  1. Open Excel.
  2. Select item Object... of the menu Insert. (1)
  3. Choose TBarCode11 from the list box to insert a barcode object into the document. (2)
  4. Please ensure that Design Mode is active. The design mode icon in the Visual Basic tool bar must be selected.
  5. Right click the barcode object and select TBarCode11 Object/Properties... from the pop-up menu. (3)
  6. Adjust the properties in the property dialog and click Ok to apply the changes.
Click to enlarge

Microsoft® Office Access™ 2016

  1. Open Access.
  2. Click on the menu DESIGN and ensure that Design View is active.
  3. Flap down the controls list.
  4. Select item ActiveX Controls .... (1)
  5. Choose TBarCode11 from the list box to insert a barcode object into the document. (2)
  6. Right click the barcode object and select TBarCode11 Object/Properties... from the pop-up menu. (3)
  7. Adjust the properties in the property dialog and click Ok to apply the changes.

Developers: Example Applications

TEC-IT provides samples that demonstrate the use of TBarCode SDK - DLL, OCX and .NET - in various applications and development environments. Sample applications for the development environments listed below are installed by default. More samples are available on http://www.tec-it.com/download. If you are not able to find a suitable example, please do not hesitate to contact our support@tec-it.com.

Click here to browse the installed example applications.

  • Microsoft® Visual Studio C++ / C# / VB / ASP.NET
  • Microsoft® Word®
  • Microsoft® Excel®
  • Microsoft® Access™
  • Microsoft® InfoPath
  • Microsoft® SQL Reporting Services
  • Microsoft® Navision
  • Microsoft® Visual Basic 6
  • Barcode Service for Crystal Reports, SSRS and Web Applications
  • Delphi
  • PHP
  • and more...

Installed Files

Installation Folders

TBarCode is installed by default in the folders specified below. Please note, that the base-folder for a 32-Bit TBarCode installation on a 64-Bit system is C:\Program Files (x86).

  • Documentation and auxiliary files: C:\Program Files\TEC-IT\TBarCode11
    Sub Folder Description
    Documentation Documentation files; see also chapter “Documentation”.
    Include C/C++ header files of TBarCode Library (TBarCode DLL).
    Lib C/C++ .lib files of TBarCode Library (TBarCode DLL).
  • Binaries: C:\Program Files\Common Files\TEC-IT\TBarCode\11.0
    File Description
    TBarCode11.dll TBarCode DLL, the barcode generator library (required by all components).
    TBarCode11.ocx TBarCode OCX, the barcode ActiveX component.
    TECIT.TBarCode.dll TBarCode .NET, the .NET assembly for the .NET barcode library and controls.
    zlib1.dll A compression library.
  • Examples, Demos and Services: C:\ProgramData\TEC-IT\TBarCode\11.0
    Sub Folder Description
    Examples Several examples, which demonstrate how to use TBarCode; see “Samples”. The samples include the Barcode Service for Crystal Reports, SSRS and web applications.
    Links Important links to our website.

Redistribution

If you want to redistribute TBarCode with your own application, you will have to include the proper binaries in your application's setup. For a more detailed explanation please examine the according Developer Manual or Developer Reference.

Documentation

The documentation files are installed in the Documentation folder.

  • If you are new to bar coding or you need a source for specific information about barcode symbologies and barcode parameters we suggest downloading TEC-IT´s Barcode Reference: http://www.tec-it.com/download/PDF/Barcode_Reference_EN.pdf.
  • If you need further information that you could not find in these documents, please do not hesitate to contact our support: support@tec-it.com.

TBarCode DLL Documentation

Documentation Description
TBarCode DLL Developer Manual The manual explains how you can use the DLL in your own applications and provides some sample source code.
TBarCode DLL Developer Reference The reference describes the API (Application Programming Interface) of TBarCode DLL.

TBarCode OCX Documentation

Documentation Description
TBarCode OCX User Manual The manual shows how to use TBarCode OCX (ActiveX component) in applications like Microsoft Office. Further, the ActiveX property pages are explained in detail.
TBarCode OCX Developer Manual The manual shows how to use TBarCode OCX with various IDEs (Integrated Development Environments) like Visual Studio.
TBarCode OCX Developer Reference The reference describes the API of TBarCode OCX.

TBarCode .NET Documentation

Documentation Description
TBarCode .NET Developer Manual The manual shows how to create barcodes in self written .NET applications (Windows Forms and ASP.NET 2.0).
TBarCode .NET Developer Reference The reference describes the API of TBarCode .NET.

TBarCode Videos

Video Channel Description
TBarCode Product Videos Check out TBarCode tutorials and how-to videos hosted on YouTube.com.
